alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 11:43AM EST until January 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Alabama, Escambia and Covington Counties. In Florida, Santa Rosa Inland and Okaloosa Inland Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light precipitation continues across the advisory area, with temperatures hovering in the lower 30`s. Potential for light freezing rain accumulations continues through noon today.
info.instruction: If traveling, drive with extreme caution and be alert for slick spots on bridges and overpasses. Leave plenty of room between you and the vehicle ahead of you. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Avoid sudden braking or acceleration and be especially cautious on hills or when making turns.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
